title: Add Otter Framework to an Angular project
description: ngAdd Otter Framework to the Angular project

preset.description: Preset of module list to automatically install

x-prompt.message: Which preset to use to start your application?

items.label: BASIC - Minimum plugin list to install for a basic Otter application. (details on https://www.npmjs.com/package/@o3r/core#preset-basic)
CMS - Add the Otter modules allowing the full administration of the application via the CMS. (details on https://www.npmjs.com/package/@o3r/core#preset-cms)
ALL - Add all the available Otter modules. (details on https://www.npmjs.com/package/@o3r/core#preset-all)

externalPresets.description: Preset of non-official module list to automatically install

enableStyling.description: Install Otter theming and styling extractor

enableConfiguration.description: Install otter configuration package and config extractor setup

enableLocalization.description: Localization generation setup and localization extractor

generateAzurePipeline.description: Generate the Azure Pipeline for the new project

commit.description: Initial git repository commit information. (Available at workspace setup only)

skipGit.description: Do not initialize a git repository. (Available at workspace setup only)

withDevtool.description: Add option to automatically register the devtool module

forceInstall.description: Force package installation (in case of unmet peer dependencies)
